alert.note: Alert for Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 9:02PM CDT until May 12 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Chester. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Clarksville. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, State Route P east of Elsberry begins flooding just east of the levee. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Saturday was 26.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening and continue falling to 23.9 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Clarksville 25.0 25.8 25.4 25.2 25.0 24.6 24.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
